description:
Honoka tells a depressed Goro about Little Angel, who can resolve any problem a person might have. Chika from the Science Club joins in the hunt, and they discover that Tatsuya is Little Angel. But Tatsuya is already the target of Koki the delinquent...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sore Sunawachi, Watashitachi wa Doushi, to Iu Koto
What That Means Is, We`re Kindred Spirits
ソレすなわち, 私たちは同志, ということ
